msContents.summary:
This manuscript contains two chapters of the Dharmaśāstra work Smṛtimuktāphala by Vaidyanātha Dīkṣita copied for Ducler in 1830-1831 by Śorakkuḍi [Tamil Curakkuṭi] Kṛṣṇaśasāstrin (U2) and Nārayaṇa (?) (U4):
the Prāyaścittakāṇḍa, Adhyāya 6 of the Smṛtimuktaphala (U2)
the Varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇa, Adhyāya 1 of the Smṛtimuktaphala (U4)

collation.desc: 1 folio = Title Page. No foliation. Verso blank. 380 x 35 mm.
87 folios = Smṛtimuktāphala, Prāyaścittakāṇḍa. Tamil foliation [1]-87. Parallel Arabic foliation 1-87. 380 x 35 mm.
5 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso, except an unblackened piḷḷaiyār cūḻi (f[1]r, lm). 380 x 35 mm.
230 folios = Smṛtimuktāphala, Varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇa. Tamil foliation [1]-230. Parallel Arabic foliation 88-317. 380/385 x 35 mm.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil foliation [1]-87 for U2, [1]-230 for U4. Continuous parallel Arabic foliation 1-317 for U2 and U4. No foliation for U1 and U3.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year vikṛti of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1830-1831. See colophons (U2, f87v5).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 92.

listBibl.bibl: Burnouf, Eugène (1832). “Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique.” Journal asiatique 10, p. 84-91. — See p. 91, no. 37.

Cabaton, A. (1907). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits sanscrits et pālis. 1er fascicule. Manuscrits sanscrits. Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des manuscrits.. Paris: Leroux. — See p. 135, no. 818.
Rodet, Léon & Feer, Léon (1872-). Catalogue des manuscrits sanscrits en écriture grantha. Manuscript, BnF Sanscrit 1775.1. — See f. 5r, no. 6.
